about_the_game:
This is a story where you play as a holy knight and a Nun from a fictional religious order of knights. You both were requested to come to this castle in Romania for a royal event, which turned into a crusade of vampires from another dimension. You must rescue all the royal family from different type of blood-eaters like: Skeletons, Ghouls, Large bats, lesser vampires, Hellhounds, Werewolfs, Wraiths, Incubus, Succubus, Bi-Incubus Devils, Greater vampire and their cult of human followers. The gameplay is planned to look similar to souls-like games but with ability to craft some health, stamina,stat boosters and weapon items.

Current State of the game:   (Version 0.35)

Enemies with a detection system:
Enemies have a certain field of view and the players can see when the enemy is able to see them, To avoid getting detected, players will be able to sneak past. After chasing for a while enemy can get tired/forget about you if you manage to loose their sight.

Combat System:
Enemies chase players until out of sight, but if not able to escape, Equip your weapon and fight back

Ragdoll system:
All characters will get ragdolled upon defeat.


Upcoming update  (Version 0.4)
In next version of the game, there will be the following additions:

  Final game planned features:

There are plans for the following features:

  • Different types of melee weapons .

  • 7+ Type of blood-eater monsters.

  • 4 mini Bosses.

  • 2 Final Bosses .

  • 10 Human characters to rescue.

  • Advanced combat system with block, parry and finisher moves.

  • Better fighting animations for the same.

  • Ranged weapons, namely crossbow, lever action revolver and a lever action rifle.

  • Companion Nun character.

  • Crafting system

  • Dismantling system

  • Trader shop

Difference between Demo and Early access release
Demo game will show a basic version of the game in current state of game. While the early access release will be much more polished and will have a story element.

About the development process

This game is being developed by a single person. The goal is to keep the development cost minimum by making everything in-house instead of buying assets from store. Because of that, it has taken over 2 years to learn all the skills related to game development and designing process.

Going forward, after this game will be finished, future games will be coming out faster. This game is just 1st out of the many stories which are linked with each other and goal is to keep them all priced as low as possible so everyone can afford to play them.

The game is already well optimized to run on low end PCs since first 1.5 years of development was done on a RX580 graphics card.

Feel free to join the discord server where u can apply to be a Play tester.

short_description: The year is 1869. You play as a holy knight and a Nun from a fictional religious order of knights. Both of you were requested to come to this castle in Romania for a royal event, which turned into a crusade of vampires from another dimension. You must now stop the Crusade and save everyone!
